00035 class KVIRC_API KviTreeWindowListItem : public QTreeWidgetItem, public KviWindowListItem
00036 {
00037         friend class KviTreeWindowList;
00038         friend class KviTreeWindowListTreeWidget;
00039         friend class KviTreeWindowListItemInternal;
00040 public:
00041         KviTreeWindowListItem(QTreeWidget * par,KviWindow * wnd);
00042         KviTreeWindowListItem(KviTreeWindowListItem * par,KviWindow * wnd);
00043         ~KviTreeWindowListItem();
00044 public:
00045         virtual QString key() const;
00046         virtual void captionChanged();
00047         virtual void highlight(int iLevel = 1);
00048         virtual void unhighlight();
00049         virtual void setProgress(int progress);
00050         virtual void applyOptions();
00051 protected:
00052         void setActive(bool bActive);
00053         bool operator<(const QTreeWidgetItem &other)const
00054         {
00055                 return key() < ((KviTreeWindowListItem*)&other)->key();
00056         }
00057 };
